SQL.LOAD: SELECT elp_entity_schedule.entity, elp_entity_schedule.entity_id, elp_entity_schedule.schedule_id, elp_entity_schedule.effective, elp_entity_schedule.expiration, elp_entity_schedule.created_date, elp_entity_schedule.created_by, elp_entity_schedule.modified_date, elp_entity_schedule.modified_by, elp_entity_schedule.entity_schedule_id, elp_schedule.code, elp_schedule.description FROM elp_entity_schedule inner join elp_schedule on elp_schedule.schedule_id = elp_entity_schedule.schedule_id WHERE elp_entity_schedule.entity_schedule_id = :entity_schedule_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT elp_entity_schedule.entity, elp_entity_schedule.entity_id, elp_entity_schedule.schedule_id, elp_entity_schedule.effective, elp_entity_schedule.expiration, elp_entity_schedule.created_date, elp_entity_schedule.created_by, elp_entity_schedule.modified_date, elp_entity_schedule.modified_by, elp_entity_schedule.entity_schedule_id, elp_schedule.code, elp_schedule.description FROM elp_entity_schedule inner join elp_schedule on elp_schedule.schedule_id = elp_entity_schedule.schedule_id WHERE elp_entity_schedule.entity_id = :entity_id and elp_entity_schedule.entity = :entity
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_SCHEDULE_ID: SELECT elp_entity_schedule.entity, elp_entity_schedule.entity_id, elp_entity_schedule.schedule_id, elp_entity_schedule.effective, elp_entity_schedule.expiration, elp_entity_schedule.created_date, elp_entity_schedule.created_by, elp_entity_schedule.modified_date, elp_entity_schedule.modified_by, elp_entity_schedule.entity_schedule_id, elp_schedule.code, elp_schedule.description FROM elp_entity_schedule inner join elp_schedule on elp_schedule.schedule_id = elp_entity_schedule.schedule_id WHERE elp_entity_schedule.schedule_id = :schedule_id and elp_entity_schedule.expiration > :UtcSysDate and ((:entity is null) or (elp_entity_schedule.entity = :entity))
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_entity_schedule SET entity = :entity, entity_id = :entity_id, schedule_id = :schedule_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE entity_schedule_id = :entity_schedule_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_entity_schedule ( entity, entity_id, schedule_id, effective, expiration, created_by, entity_schedule_id ) VALUES ( :entity, :entity_id, :schedule_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :entity_schedule_id )
